q: How does the AI Insights feature work?
a: Our AI analyzes your journal entries to provide personalized insights and answers to your questions. It can even include links to specific journal entries when referencing them.

q: Can I organize my journal entries?
a: Yes! Use collections to group related entries together. You can also filter by date, mood, or collection to easily find past entries.

q: How does the mood tracking work?
a: Our AI automatically analyzes the sentiment of your entries and assigns a mood score. You'll get visual analytics showing your emotional patterns over time.
Our platform is fully responsive and works beautifully on all devices. A dedicated mobile app is coming soon!
